attributes.action: Ban the use of police horses at protests
attributes.additional_details: Consider removing the use of police horses in such stressful situation. Consider different modes of crowd control, these animals shouldn’t have to risk being in harms way.
attributes.background: We have recently seen how the use of police horses is a dangerous tactic used by the police. It can not only cause the animal immense stress but also endangers the public and rider if not kept under control. It is time we stopped using innocent animals is such high risk situations.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
